posts.post_title: FS: 3 T205 - SGC 60, SGC 60, and SGC 50
posts.post_content:
I prefer PayPal payment owed, but will accept Paypal goods with no request for an extra few %. 

Prices include delivery. Take all three for 200$ delivered with insurance. 

Please e-mail only: [url]the.cards.of.our.pastime@gmail.com[/url]




T205: Edgar Lennox Sweet Caporal SGC 50 (Interesting centering issues for the portrait, corners are excellent) - 55$

T205: George McBride (SGC 60) - 75$

T205: George Stone (SGC 60)  -  85$
